data.pricing_trends: Pricing tends to spike during peak seasons by 20-30%. Off-peak seasons offer competitive rates ideal for budget-conscious travelers.
data.booking_windows: Advance bookings (3-6 months prior) yield the best deals. Last-minute offers also available but less predictable.
data.demand: High demand for summer and winter seasons, while spring and autumn see moderate travelers.
data.competition: Destinations such as Destination X and Y attract similar traveler segments with competitive pricing and unique offerings.
